short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Inject custom request and response headers.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: With Rubric, it is possible to inject custom HTTP request and response headers into requests performed by your browser. This is useful during web development, debugging and privacy and security research.
